title: Re-issue an Invoice
description: A business customer has lost their invoice for a past order and needs a copy for their records.

tasks.description: Find the customer's order using the order number.
Generate a PDF copy of the original invoice for that order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully regenerates the invoice document.

tasks.description: Email the PDF invoice to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the email with the invoice attached.
